{{also|鸿都}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=鸿都}}

===Etymology===
Hóngdū was originally the name of one of the gates of the Northern Palace in [[Luoyang]] (capital of China during the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]]). Later, it came to refer generically to any capital.
